references.paper_title: On Gradient Descent Ascent for Nonconvex-Concave Minimax Problems
references.reason: This paper provides foundational theoretical analysis of gradient descent ascent methods for nonconvex-concave minimax problems, which is crucial for understanding and developing improved algorithms.

references.paper_title: Alternating proximal-gradient steps for (stochastic) nonconvex-concave minimax problems
references.reason: This paper introduces alternating proximal-gradient methods for solving nonconvex-concave minimax problems, offering an alternative approach and convergence analysis compared to gradient descent ascent.
This paper establishes near-optimal complexity bounds for solving minimax optimization problems, providing benchmarks for the efficiency of new algorithms.

references.paper_title: Accelerated Zeroth-Order and First-Order Momentum Methods from Mini to Minimax Optimization
references.reason: This paper proposes accelerated zeroth-order and first-order momentum methods for minimax optimization, which are highly relevant to the paper's focus on zeroth-order methods.

references.paper_title: Zeroth-order algorithms for nonconvex-strongly-concave minimax problems with improved complexities
references.reason: This paper focuses on zeroth-order algorithms for solving nonconvex-strongly-concave minimax problems, directly addressing a key problem setting in the main paper.
